item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 27th March
item.description:
28 day with give and take carriageway pothole 800x300x40mm tarmac patch required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lopping of large aged Plane tree with TPO, 27th March
item.description:
The tree is located on Parabola Road near Cheltenham Ladies College St Austin’s House. The beautiful mature Plane tree was severely lopped last week. As the tree is located well away from any buildings I cannot believe there was any justification for the desecration of such a beautiful tree. Surely TPO’s are placed on such trees for good reason. Could you please explain why such action was taken? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
